tag_list: daily-deals, handmade, etsy, giveaway, craft-supplies, crafty-attic
overview:
Crafty Attic offers daily deals on handmade goods, craft supplies, and vintage findings. Independent sellers from the handmade communities of Etsy and Artfire offer their products at 50% off or more.

In addition to daily deals, Crafty Attic also offers a weekly giveaway and interview with an artisan; they also feature vendors in a shoppe stocked with quality handmade goods.

New deals begin daily at 10 am EST.
